description: Show the full details of a job schedule shift start-at change.
permissions: Admins can view any job schedule shift start-at change. Non-admin access is limited to changes within the policy scope: those tied to job schedule shifts related to the user broker memberships, customer memberships, or flexible shifts tied to accepted broker tenders where the user is a manager member of the trucker.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required and must be a non-empty start-at change ID.
